original_text: He spoke these words while teaching in the temple courts near the place where the offerings were put. Yet no one seized him, because his hour had not yet come.
korean_text: 이 말씀은 성전에서 가르치실 때에 헌금함 앞에서 하셨으나 잡는 사람이 없으니 이는 그의 때가 아직 이르지 아니하였음이러라

sentences.original_text: while teaching in the temple courts
near the place where the offerings were put
because his hour had not yet come
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 때가 아직 이르지 않았기 때문이다
